title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.3 - Bets by personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.3 - Bets by personnel

State Regulations

No individual employed by an off-track betting
corporation as a pari-mutuel clerk, cashier or seller shall be permitted to bet
during those periods of any day on which such person is actually employed in
such capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4407.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
